column2: Principal / Professor / Assistant Professor / Associate Professor / HOD of Fashion Designing / Interior Design / Architecture  1. Department of Fashion Designing Name of the Programme: BA in Dress Making & Fashion Coordination, 3 Years full time, Bachelor / Master of Fashion Designing. Broad areas of specialization of the programme: Fashion Design is a programme, consisting various specializations such as Apparel Designing, Textile Designing, Textile Science, Textile Wet Processing, Traditional Indian Costumes, World Costumes, Embroidery, Pattern Making and Garment Manufacturing, Apparel Production and Quality Control, Fashion Merchandising, Entrepreneurship Skills and many more similar domains. Qualification Requirements: Ph.D. in Fashion Design / Textile is Mandatory. M.Sc. in Textiles and Clothing / M.Sc. in Fashion Designing / M.A. in Fashion Designing / M.Sc. in Fashion & Apparel Design / Post Graduation in Fashion Design / Textile Clothing or related Programmes. NET or SET (Maharashtra). Additional Skills: Softwares related to Fashion Design like Corel Draw, Fashion illustration, CAD, Photoshop, 3D Fashion Design, etc. Experience: 15yr+ / 10yrs to 25 yrs. Skills Required:  Lectures  Audio Visual Aids  Industry Institute Interaction  Market Survey  Internship  Demonstration  Practical Projects & Assignments  Seminars / Workshops / Guest lectures  Industrial Visit  Participation in State / National level events 2. Department of Interior Design / Architecture Name of the Programme: Bachelor of Interior Design (BID) Broad areas of specialization of the programme: Interior Design, Graphics of Interior Design, Technical Skills, Elements in Interior Design, History of Interior, Interior Services, Landscapes in Interior: Lighting and Colors in Interior, Contemporary Interior Design, Working Drawing, Estimation and Costing, Design- elective, Project Management, Project Work, Professional Practice, Design Code, Project Report. Qualification Requirements: Ph.D. in Architecture / Interior Design is Mandatory. M.Arch. / B.Arch. with 15 Years of Teaching experience / Master in Interior Design with 10 years of teaching experience. Additional Skills: Software Auto CAD, 3D Max, Sketchup, V-ray, etc. Experience: 15yr+ / 10yrs to 25 yrs. Skills Required:  Lectures / Demonstrations  Power Point Presentations  Assignments  Tutorials  Seminars  Project reports  Case Studies  Market Survey  Group discussion

column2: TIPS College is looking for Associate Professor to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Teaching and Instruction: Associate Professors are responsible for teaching undergraduate and/or graduate-level courses in their area of expertise      They develop syllabi, prepare course materials, deliver lectures, facilitate discussions, and assess student performance      They may also supervise student research projects, theses, and dissertations      Research and Scholarship: Associate Professors engage in research activities, pursue scholarly publications, and contribute to the advancement of knowledge in their field      They conduct research projects, secure research funding, collaborate with colleagues, and publish their findings in academic journals or present them at conferences      They may also mentor and guide graduate students in their research pursuits      Academic Advising: Associate Professors provide academic guidance and advising to students      They assist students in selecting courses, developing academic plans, and pursuing research or career opportunities within their discipline      They may also serve as thesis advisors or mentors to graduate students      Service and Committee Work: Associate Professors contribute to the administrative functions of their department, college, or university through service and committee work      They participate in faculty meetings, serve on academic committees, contribute to curriculum development, and provide input on various institutional matters

column1: Associate Professor of Computer Science & Engineering
column2: Join Our Team at Brainware University     Position: ?Associate Professor of Computer Science & Engineering Location: ?Barasat, Kolkata, India Starting Salary: ?10 LPA Are you an accomplished Computer Science educator and researcher ready to take the next step in your career? Brainware University is seeking a dynamic individual to join our team as an? Associate Professor ?of Computer Science & Engineering. About Brainware University: At Brainware University, we are committed to nurturing innovation, knowledge, and academic excellence. Located in the heart of Kolkata, our institution is known for its world-class faculty and cutting-edge research initiatives. Join us in our mission to empower the leaders of tomorrow. Position Overview: As an Associate Professor of Computer Science & Engineering, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the academic direction of our institution. You will work alongside a dedicated team of educators and researchers to deliver exceptional education and drive forward innovative research in the field. Key Responsibilities: Lead and mentor students in their academic and research pursuits. Contribute to curriculum development and program enhancement. Engage in active research, publish in reputable journals, and present at conferences. Collaborate with colleagues on interdisciplinary research projects. Stay current with industry trends and integrate them into the curriculum. Assist in administrative and leadership tasks as required. Requirements and Qualifications: A Ph.D. in Computer Science & Engineering or a closely related field with a good academic background. Proven teaching excellence and a strong research portfolio. Minimum 8 years of teaching and research experience in Computer Science. Proficiency in relevant programming languages and technologies. At least 7 publications in peer-reviewed journals. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills. A passion for advancing computer science education. What We Offer: Competitive starting salary of 10 LPA plus yearly performance incentives. Attractive benefits package. Opportunities for professional development and advancement. Access to state-of-the-art research facilities. A collaborative and supportive academic environment. Join us in shaping the future of Computer Science education and research. Brainware University is the place where you can make a significant impact on the next generation of tech leaders. To apply, please submit your CV, and a cover letter, to? hrd@brainwareuniversity.ac.in . or you may call? 033-69010542 Or visit our career page at? https://careers.brainwareuniversity.ac.in/ Unlock your potential and elevate your career at Brainware University.

column1: Opening For Associate / Professor in CSE Dept. For NAAC A++ University
column2: Job Description for Associate Professor: We are searching for a knowledgeable and reliable Associate Professor to join our faculty. The Associate Professors responsibilities include teaching a number of classes and seminars, attending conferences, conducting research, and supervising students. You should be able to collaborate with colleagues, advise teaching assistants, and tackle several administrative tasks. To be successful as an Associate Professor, you should be able to work to tight deadlines and juggle multiple responsibilities. Outstanding candidates have excellent management knowledge, networking skills, and the ability to build strong professional relationships with both students and colleagues. Associate Professor Responsibilities: Developing and delivering course material, curricula, and syllabi. Assisting with the training and recruitment of new lecturers, teaching assistants, and Professors. Conducting research, publishing papers, and attending conferences. Attending academic events and networking with other researchers and field experts. Supervising, advising, and mentoring teaching assistants and graduate students. Knowledge on applying/facing accreditation bodies such as NBA, NAAC etc., Participating in faculty and departmental meetings. Shortlisting, interviewing, and selecting students for graduate programs. Organizing guest seminars and faculty events where students can interact with established industry professionals. Traveling to other higher education settings to gain experience and expand networks. Writing proposals to secure research funding. Funded projects and consultancy, global certifications in respective specializations will be an added advantage Should engage with a range of professionals and students Associate Professor Requirements: BE/B.Tech & ME/ M.Tech in Computer Science and Ph.D. in Computer Science from reputed universities in India/globally (Mandatory). 5 to 10 years teaching / research / industry of which 2 years post PhD experience is  MANDATORY . Impact factor publications/patents (minimum 7 in Scopus/SEI/ESEI) is  MANDATORY . Excellent research, teaching, and presentation skills.  Professor Job Description:  We are looking for a well-organized, resourceful professor to join our excellent faculty. The professor's responsibilities include, but are not limited to, teaching a requisite number of graduate classes, assisting with the development of course material, supervising postgraduate students, regularly publishing journal articles, serving on committees, attending conferences, writing proposals for grants, delivering presentations, and handling other administrative duties. To be successful as a professor, you should be able to balance teaching and research responsibilities. Outstanding professors are able to conduct independent research, accurately allocate resources, and provide subject-related and management advice to the faculty.  Professor Responsibilities:   Developing curricula and delivering course material.   Conducting research, fieldwork, and investigations, and writing up reports.   Publishing research, attending conferences, delivering presentations, and networking with others in the field.   Traveling to other universities or academic settings to participate in learning opportunities and gain experience.   Knowledge on applying/facing accreditation bodies such as NBA, NAAC etc.,   Participating in committee, departmental, and faculty meetings.   Providing training and mentoring to teaching assistants and junior lecturers.   Reviewing methods and teaching materials and making recommendations for improvement.   Assisting with student recruitment, interviews, and academic counselling sessions.   Professor Requirements:   BE/B.Tech & ME/ M.Tech in Computer Science and Ph.D. in Computer Science from reputed universities in India/globally (Mandatory).   10 years teaching/ research /industrial experience of which at least 5 years should be at the level of Associate professor. or Minimum of 13 years experience in teaching and / or Research and /or Industry. In case of research experience, good academic record and books/ research paper publications /IPR/ patents record shall be required as deemed fit by the expert members of the selection committee. Extensive experience teaching in an academic setting.   If the experience in industry is considered, the same shall be at managerial level equivalent to Associate Professor with active participation record in devising/ designing, planning, executing, analyzing, quality control, innovating, training, technical books/ research paper publications / IPR/ patents, etc., as deemed fit by the expert members of the Selection committee.   Should have graduated 2 PhD Students (Mandatory)   Published articles and proven experience as an academic.   Excellent presentation and written and verbal communication skills.   A sound understanding of and passion for subject matter.   Willingness to work long hours, and travel frequently.   A growth mindset and excellent networking abilities.   Impact factor publications/patents (minimum 10 in Scopus/SEI/ESEI) is mandatory.  Experience in following areas would be an added advantage: Area -1 - Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning Area -2 - Cybersecurity Area -3 Data Engineering Desired Candidate Profile:  Teaching experience in a university setting.  Published works would be advantageous.  Strong analytical, observational, and problem-solving skills.  A good record of attending conferences and academic events.  Excellent research, writing, and interpersonal skills.  A passion for teaching and engaging with students.  Patience, understanding, and willingness to help. Work timing: 8:45 AM 4:30 PM (Monday to Saturday) with Sunday (Week Off) Compensation: As per Industry Standard. Industry Type: University Functional Area: Teaching & Training Employment Type: Full Time, Permanent

column1: Associate Professor - Computer Science / Information Science
column2: Looking for Associate Professors with Doctorate (PhD) in Computer Science (CS) / Information Science (IS) / Information Technology (IT) / Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) / Data Science (DS) for below mentioned Departments. Dept of Computer Science (CS) Engineering Dept of Information Science (IS) Engineering Dept of Computer Science - AI and ML Engineering Dept of Computer Science - Data Science Engineering Desired Candidate Profile Doctorate (PhD) in Computer Science - Allied Specialization [Computer Science (CS) / Information Science (IS) / Information Technology (IT) / Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) / Data Science (DS) etc]. 5 Years Teaching Experience in Engineering College after Masters in Computer Science - Allied Specialization. Masters (M. E. / M. Tech. / M. S. or Integrated M. Tech) in Computer Science (CS) / Information Science (IS) / Information Technology (IT) / Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) / Data Science (DS). Note: All HoD, Professors, Associate Professors, Assistant Professors, Teaching Assistants are recruited on the payroll of the Institution. Recruitment is done directly and also through Consultants. Only applicants who are interested to work from Institution Campus (Offline) need to apply. Teaching Demo and Technical Interview will be held Online or Offline in Bengaluru Campus. Shortlisted Applicants need to join us immediately (or max within 60 days). Applicants looking for only Online / Work from Home Opportunities permanently will not be considered for this role. This is a scheduled Interview drive (Online and Offline Interview). This requirement is for Bengaluru Location. We dont offer or confirm selection to any candidate without Direct (Face to Face) Offline Interview (atleast 1 round of discussion) in Bengaluru. All recruitments will be on the payroll of the Institution. Candidates need not pay any Fee / Charges to any Consultant for Registration / Placement fee.

column2: Roles and Responsibilities: Teaching: Deliver lectures, tutorials, and practical sessions in core subjects related to CS, IT, and AI. Develop and implement innovative teaching methods to enhance student learning. Prepare and update course materials, including syllabi, assignments, and exams. Supervise student projects, internships, and research activities. Curriculum Development: Participate in the design and revision of the B.Tech curriculum to ensure it meets industry standards and advancements in the field. Incorporate emerging technologies and trends into the curriculum. Research and Development: Conduct high-quality research in relevant areas of CS, IT, and AI. Publish research findings in reputed journals and present at conferences. Secure research funding through grants and collaboration with industry. Mentorship and Guidance: Provide academic and career counseling to students. Mentor students in their academic and extracurricular activities. Guide students on research projects and innovative ideas. Administrative Duties: Participate in departmental meetings and contribute to the overall development of the department. Assist in organizing seminars, workshops, and conferences. Engage in community service and outreach activities. Professional Development: Stay updated with the latest advancements in the field through continuous professional development. Attend workshops, training sessions, and conferences to enhance teaching and research skills. Preferred Candidate: Educational Qualifications: A Ph.D. in Computer Science, Information Technology, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field from a recognized university. Candidates with a Masters degree and significant industry experience may also be considered. Experience: Minimum of 2-5 years of teaching experience at the university level. Proven track record of research with publications in reputed journals. Experience in supervising student projects and research activities. Skills and Competencies: Strong knowledge of core subjects in CS, IT, and AI. Proficiency in programming languages, software development, and AI tools. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Ability to inspire and motivate students. Other Requirements: Commitment to academic excellence and integrity. Collaborative and team-oriented mindset. Willingness to engage in continuous learning and professional development.
column11: Data Science, Computer Science, Python, Aiml, Teaching

column2: TIPS College is looking for Associate Professor to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Teaching and Instruction: Associate Professors are responsible for teaching undergraduate and/or graduate-level courses in their area of expertise      They develop syllabi, prepare course materials, deliver lectures, facilitate discussions, and assess student performance      They may also supervise student research projects, theses, and dissertations      Research and Scholarship: Associate Professors engage in research activities, pursue scholarly publications, and contribute to the advancement of knowledge in their field      They conduct research projects, secure research funding, collaborate with colleagues, and publish their findings in academic journals or present them at conferences      They may also mentor and guide graduate students in their research pursuits      Academic Advising: Associate Professors provide academic guidance and advising to students      They assist students in selecting courses, developing academic plans, and pursuing research or career opportunities within their discipline      They may also serve as thesis advisors or mentors to graduate students      Service and Committee Work: Associate Professors contribute to the administrative functions of their department, college, or university through service and committee work      They participate in faculty meetings, serve on academic committees, contribute to curriculum development, and provide input on various institutional matters
column11: Associate Professor

column2: Role & responsibilities:-   Develop and deliver graduate      courses in computer science and engineering, including but not limited to      algorithms, data structures, software engineering, computer architecture,      artificial intelligence, machine learning, and cybersecurity. Mentor and advice students on academic      matters, research projects, internships, and career development      opportunities. Conduct research in your area of      specialization, publish scholarly articles in peer-reviewed journals, and      present research findings at conferences and seminars. Provide leadership and guidance to junior      faculty, graduate students, and research assistants in the department. Contribute to the academic      governance of the university through participation in faculty senate,      academic councils, and other institutional committees. Stay abreast of emerging trends, technologies,      and best practices in computer science and engineering education and      research. Program Building: Play an integral role in the      establishment and growth of our new Computer Science and AI Department.      This will involve a range of activities from faculty recruitment to      partnerships with industry and academia. Academic Entrepreneurship: Leverage your      entrepreneurial skills to drive innovation within the program, exploring      new models of teaching, research, and industry collaboration. Strategy: Participate actively in Planning      & Implementing the growth strategy for the program in alignment with      the overall vision & philosophy of the University. Community Building: Foster a vibrant,      inclusive, and collaborative community within the program. Organize and      participate in events such as hackathons, meetups, guest lectures, etc. Prepare      lectures, syllabus, and labs for their classes Grade      the class assignments. Prepare,      execute, and grade the exams. Calculate      the grades of the students Advise      the students outside the class Research      new learning techniques and introduce them to students Supervise      and evaluate teaching by graduates and colleagues Lead      educational trips and attend various seminars Student      counselling Supervise      and help graduates in their research work Evaluate      PhD written and oral exams Write      proposals for funding agencies Draft      papers for academic journal publication Presentations      in various institutes about higher education Research      new developments in education Give      public lectures Ensure      internships and placements for all students, build industry partnerships      and conduct experiential activities for students. A      practical approach in teaching should be adhered to which involves 70%      teaching and 30% service/administrative/research/scholarship tasks to      promote hands-on learning, real-world application, and problem solving The      working hours of the teachers in full employment should not be less than      40 hours a week for 30 working weeks (180 teaching days) in an academic      year. Necessary      for the teachers to be available for at least 7 hours daily in the      University: At      least 2 hours for mentoring of students (minimum 15 students per      coordinator) for Community Development/ Extra-Curricular Activities/      Library Consultation in case of undergraduate courses. At      least 2 hours for research in case of postgraduate courses, for which      necessary space and infrastructure should be provided by the      University/College. The      minimum direct teaching-learning process hours should be 14 hours A      relaxation of 2 hours in the workload may be given to Professors,      Associate Professors who are actively involved in extension activities,      administration. They      are eligible for paid vacation, holidays, and sick time in accordance with      University policy He/she      should teach 3-4 subjects based on educational qualification and work      experience.  Teach      minimum of 14 hours per week, including introductory courses, core courses      and specialization courses in the school. All courses must be taught in      accordance with established University -approved curriculum, policies and      College requirements, and in compliance with regulatory and accreditation      agency requirements and standards. Implement      instructional strategies appropriate for the learner and content,      differentiating instruction to meet diverse learner needs; promote student      success by using creative and diverse teaching methods and      strategies.  Communicate      with students regularly, using a variety of mechanisms both written and      verbal; ensure availability to students based on the learning environment      and according to University policy and instructional standards; guide and      direct students to resources that support student success, such as the      learning management system, academic and professional resources, and      University resources. Preferred candidate profile:-   B Tech      (CSE/CS)/Mtech (CSE/CS) and Ph.D. (CSE/CS) is minimum requirement with      masters degree in relevant subject with at least 55% marks from an Indian      University, or an equivalent degree from an accredited foreign university. Preference      will be given to candidates having specialisation in Data Science ,AI and      Machine learning. Associate      Professor- Minimum of 8 years of experience in teaching / research / industry. Record      of Significant management and leadership experience, successful working      relationships with internal and external constituencies, including      faculty, students, alumni, and the larger professional information      management community. In the      case of research experience, good academic record and books/ research      paper publications/ IPR/ patent record are desired.  Perks and benefits:-   Attractive Salary Package. Multiple Leaves. Medical Benefits.
